org.bch.c3pro.consumer.external

Class SQSAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bch.c3pro.consumer.external.SQSAccess

  • public class SQSAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the access to the Amazon SQS. It's a singleton. Th method getInstance() should be the only way to ger an instance of the class
    Author:
    CHIP-IHL
